ComicInfo.Summary: "RISE," Part One A death in the family. A crisis of faith. A changing of the guard. Beginning here, everything changes as Eddie Collins loses more than just his helmet when a NEW ShadowHawk assumes the mantle. A perfect jumping on point for new readers, RISE redefines the book and the character and builds towards the stunning climax in Issue 12. Think you know ShadowHawk? Think again.
ComicInfo.Title: Rise (Part 1)
